row.text: Dominico, abbati S. Iustinae Patavino, concordia cum canonicis violata, permittit, „ut in obsequiis defunctorum, episcopo absente, vel missam cantare nolente, in monasterio specialem missam cantet“. Ughelli It. sacr. V. 441, Gloria Cod. dipl. Pad. II. 361, Migne 200 p. 1146. — „Intelleximus ex scripto“.
